company_name: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Industri Kereta Api
job_description:
Bagian Technology Process Management and RAMS:
Menjalankan kegiatan di Bagian Technology Process Management and RAMS yang meliputi pengelolaan kegiatan arsip dan ekspedisi data (kode material, Bill of Materials, routings, specifications, drawings, product/material classification), pengelolaan jalannya network planning, penyusunan jadwal, monitoring engineering order dan engineering change order serta analisa Reliability, Availability, Maintainability, and Safety (RAMS) mulai fase preliminary design, detailed design, analisa kegagalan komponen, pengelolaan hazard log, hingga penyusunan dokumen final safety case.
